biblinkcreator

Class DataStructure.DownloadParameterData

  • java.lang.Object
    • biblinkcreator.DataStructure.DownloadParameterData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataStructure.APIDownloadParameterData
    Enclosing class:
    DataStructure

    public static class DataStructure.DownloadParameterData
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class which can be used to provide the general download parameters of APIs.

      • DownloadParameterData

        public DownloadParameterData(int connectTimeout,
                             int readTimeout,
                             int maxAllowedConsecutiveErrors)
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - The connection timeout in milliseconds.
        readTimeout - The read timeout in milliseconds.
        maxAllowedConsecutiveErrors - The number of consecutive errors allowed during the downloads.
